name: Data scientist / Data engineer / Data analyst
description:
We are looking for a polyvalent data swiss knife profile to achieve our main goal - to make the pleasure and benefits of sport sustainably accessible to many! Working hand to hand with services and other data actors will help us discover the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us to make smarter decisions to deliver even better products, services and facilitate the life of our users.

We welcome candidates who would like to work in dynamic teams focused on implementing the best user experience in sports retail, where innovative ideas are welcomed, and decisions about their implementation are made quickly and without delays. We are looking for candidates who like sports just like us!

Your mission, fast paced around the data driven transformation will be a halfway between data engineering and data analytics.

Working hand to hand with other data actors you will :

  • Interact with the stakeholders to understand and gather their needs
  • Contribute to the data warehousing solution to bring the best KPI to the consumers
  • Plan and deploy a BI solution using the GCP platform
  • Design automated reporting and dashboard
  • Once deployed : follow usage, ensure training, ensure maintenance and optimization

Then, exploit available data to provide ML based solutions on the following topics :

  • Customer base Segmentation/ Analysis
  • Forecasting.
  • Pricing solutions
  • Text analysis

PLEASE WRITE YOUR CANDIDATURE IN ENGLISH

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Autonomously plan and respond to the business demand with BI solutions.
  • Build automated data flows.
  • Document your work
  • Present information using data visualization techniques
  • Interpret business need and transform it into a technical solution
  • Collaborate with business actors for the implementation of solutions.
  • Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns
  • Produce predictive models

SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES:

  • Set of realized use cases (preferably in retail field)
  • Proficiency in Python and SQL (JS is a plus)
  • Experience working with github
  • Experience with cloud data/data processing services (Amazon, Google, Yandex)
  • You are a doer: you realise by yourself and take the initiative.
  • You see the global picture of a project: you are able to split the tasks.
  • Ability to provide results of the team work in a clear manner with the help of the available visualization tools
  • Fluent Russian and English
  • You are a team-player
  • You are curious and a fast learner
  • Communication skills: ability to simplify and formalize.
  • Theoretical and practical mastery of a wide scope of machine learning fields : Deep Learning , Time series analysis , clustering ...
  • Strong quantitative analytical skills

WE PROPOSE:

  • Integration and training plan, French management style
  • A wide range of liberty to act
  • Young ambitious team with a friendly atmosphere
  • Horizontal and vertical career development
  • Competitive salary
  • Perspective of fast evolution within the company
  • International mobility
  • Medical and life insurance
  • Opportunity to become a shareholder
  • Discount 20% on Decathlon goods
  • Corporate Sports

Location: Office in Park Legend
